page.title: 13SWEET SURVEY IN BELLE VALE
page.content: In our sweet survey there were{thirty {six}different varieties of sweets chosen.{Crisps}got the highest vote. These are potatoes sliced very thinly, cooked and then coated with many different flavours. Next came{Mars {bars.}These are milk chocolate bars with caramel and a sort of soft fluffy fudge in the middle. They have been popular for years. The next highest vote was for{milk chocolate}on its own as plain chocolate I think is a bit sickly.{Toffee}came next. This sticks to your teeth. I like it hard but most prefer it soft so that it doesn't break your teeth.{Twix}came next. It is my favourite sweet and is a biscuit covered with toffee and chocolate. {Minstrels}and{Jelly Babies}both got high votes. Minstrels are chocolate beans with different centres and Jelly Babies are in the shape of little men.
